contexts.context: ...often called in the West, are known as <mark>'bonewalkers'</mark> in Morrowind. Magic preserves the bonewalker's fleshy remains...
...known as 'bonewalkers' in Morrowind. Magic preserves the <mark>bonewalker's</mark> fleshy remains along with the bones and spirit....
...fleshy remains along with the bones and spirit. <mark>Bonewalkers</mark> are readily identified by the sharp protuberances of bone...
...rituals that bind them to this plane. All <mark>bonewalkers</mark> are malevolent and dangerous, but the greater bonewalkers...
...bonewalkers are malevolent and dangerous, but the greater <mark>bonewalkers</mark> are far worse than the more common 'lesser' bonewalkers...
...bonewalkers are far worse than the more common 'lesser' <mark>bonewalkers</mark>. Thankfully, normal weapons harm bonewalkers.
...common 'lesser' bonewalkers. Thankfully, normal weapons harm <mark>bonewalkers</mark>.
